WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 04 JAN 19
   BY M/V VANTAGE TOWING SIX 155 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-29S 042-52W, 24-16S 042-24W,
   24-41S 042-19W, 24-37S 042-48W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3964/18.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 05 JAN 19.
